q1.question: What should I expect during my photoshoot?
q1.answer: Photography at Mavis Studio is a collaborative experience! Think of it as a creative performance where everyone plays a role. Your cooperation, smiles, and positive energy combine with our professional expertise to create magical photos.
q1.need1: Follow photographer's direction on poses and expressions
q1.need2: Stay flexible if weather or conditions change
q1.need3: Communicate if you're tired or uncomfortable
q1.promise1: Expert guidance every step of the way
q1.promise2: Help you feel relaxed and confident
q1.promise4: Deliver photos consistent with your chosen photographer's style
q1.promise5: Do our absolute best to make you smile
q1.important: Final results depend on teamwork. Beautiful photos require your genuine smiles, cooperation with direction, and willingness to trust the creative process.

q2.question: What if it rains on my photoshoot day?
q2.answer: Don't worry! We have beautiful indoor backup locations, and rain can actually create romantic, artistic photos. We'll either adapt our plan or reschedule based on your preference. Weather is part of outdoor photography – staying flexible helps us make the most of any condition!

q3.question: What if I don't like my photos?
q3.answer: We're committed to your satisfaction! However, please remember:
q3.point1: You selected your photographer based on their portfolio style
q3.point2: Final photos will match that artistic style
q3.point3: Great photos require cooperation – your expressions and poses matter
q3.point4: Photography is subjective – we can't guarantee you'll love every shot
q3.conclusion: We'll guide you throughout the shoot and do everything possible to capture beautiful moments. Open communication during the session helps ensure the best results!
